Note: After installing the Motivation dashboard, select the 'Keep it' button on the notice that reads "Change back to Google'' for the best experience. The Motivation dashboard will appear as intended on each new tab as a result. ğŸ™‚

With your own personalized dashboard, you can accomplish your goals more quickly and consistently. Hundreds of calming images for your wallpaper, a simple but effective ToDo list and inspirational quotes and mantras are included.

Level up your workspace environment and increase your day-to-day productivity with the Motivation dashboard.

Once installed, the Motivation dashboard greets you with a gorgeous background and a search bar that has a simple appearance.
